mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, COM_NUM,COM_ID,COM_PASS,COM_NAME COM_SUBJECT,COM_CLASS, COM_CONT,COM_DATE,COM_READCOUNT,COM_FILE COM_RE_REF,COM_RE_LEV, COM_RE_SEQ from (select * from com order by COM_RE_REF desc, COM_RE_SEQ asc) ) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10 +1 ) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
